Uses of Class
uno.anahata.asi.model.core.AbstractPart

Packages that use AbstractPart
Package
Description
uno.anahata.asi.gemini
Provides the concrete implementation of the anahata-ai core framework for the Google Gemini API.
uno.anahata.asi.model.core
Provides the core, model-agnostic domain model for all conversational AI interactions.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool
Defines the model-agnostic domain model for the tool (function) calling subsystem.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.bad
Provides the domain model for tools that were requested by the model but could not be found.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.java
Provides the concrete domain model for tools implemented as Java methods via reflection.
uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat.render
